rows.translation: TRULY WE REVEALED it on the Night of Determination.

bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, most benevolent, ever-merciful.

rows.translation: How will you know what the Night of Determination is?
rows.transliteration: wa mā adrāka mā laylatul qadr

rows.arabic: لَيْلَةُ ٱلْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍ
rows.translation: Better is the Night of Determination than a thousand months.
rows.transliteration: laylatul qadri khayrun min alfi shahr

rows.arabic: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمْرٍ
rows.translation: On (this night) the angels and grace descend by the dispensation of their Lord, for settling all affairs.
rows.transliteration: tanazzalul malā-ikatu war rūḥu fīhā bi-idhni rabbihim min kulli amr

rows.translation: It is peace till the dawning of the day.
